website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Trailster is a trail running shoe that has excellent workmanship and good grip for running in demanding terrain conditions.  Also designed for heel-strikers, the shoes are known to be lightweight and breathable to help make sure the feet feel comfortable during an extended run. Even with some reviews of the Trailster having a narrow toe box, we can conclude that we are talking about a trail shoe that, for a very economical price, will not disappoint those who take their first strides in the world of trail.
pros: A notable number of Salomon Trailster wearers were impressed with the shoe's excellent grip even when running downhill at full speed
Mentioned by most runners was that the Trailster provides ample cushioning for the very technical trails they run with lots of rocks and tree roots
Also noted by wearers is how well put together this running shoe is
According to a lot of users, the Trailster is a great lightweight shoe that offers flexibility and feel to the ground beneath while running
A handful of users also liked the shoe as they say it had a very comfortable footbed, and after the first few miles, their feet were feeling at home in the shoe
The Salomon Trailster is also easy to clean when necessary, which made quite many wearers happy
A couple of runners particularly appreciated the shoe's thick ankle cushioning which helped a lot with their stability in running various types of terrain
Majority of those who have purchased the Trailster agree that the shoe is a great value for money
cons: The shoe's toe box was also noted by several wearers to be narrow and shallow, causing a few serious blisters on their feet
One user had an issue with the shoelaces saying it was very slippery and untied easily
Most trail runners thought that the shoe could be better if it had some reflective element to it for night trail runs

customer_reviews.title: Amzing, but not water resistent
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say anythiing about those shoes, they are perfect and confortable, but water goes in. I was expecting they were waterproof or water resistent, but they aren't.
customer_reviews.author: fabiodibitonto

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe - Order half a size up for perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these half a size bigger than my usual size after reading previous reviews, which worked out to be a perfect fit. These trail shoes are ideal for me - great grip, not too clunky and light compared to other trail shoes I've had. Bargain for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My dad asked me to order them on his behalf. He said for the money they are an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very small sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Tried two pairs of these and both way too small, gave up in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: buy one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning the shoes, because the pair i've bought is just too small otherwise it looks good quality and I will try to buy one size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name.

customer_reviews.title: excellent bits of kit
customer_reviews.text: Followed sizing in my other Salomon shoes and these give me same perfect fit, stability and comfort from first putting on. Great downhill grip on various loose and rough surfaces. protection from stones yet feedback through sole. Have only used on four runs up to 12.5 km so far.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but a bit too pricey hence four stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem to be sturdy which is great for trail running. However buy one size bigger than your usual size as the sizing is slightly off.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Hb
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product. Quality very high. Comfortable. Worth every penny u spend on it
customer_reviews.author: Hikmet Bilici

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Order 1⁄2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these once, so can't comment on durability etc., but first impressions are very good, they're lightweight and comfortable, and give excellent grip and good support/stability. When I first put them on I thought they were a bit tight, but they're just snug. You should probably get 1⁄2 size larger than normally, as they are a bit on the small side. (In that sense they remind me of Adidas, which also are a bit small and snug; I don't know if this is a hangover from when Salomon was part of the Adidas group?)
customer_reviews.author: RobA

customer_reviews.title: Bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5 although as this size is rare I normally take a 9 and use insoles. These are a quality shoe by a quality brand. The outer material and sole are very good and internally are comfy, but...my feet felt really quite squashed at the toes. A 9 would have been much better so my recommendation would be to get a half size up from your normal size. Other than that, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, basic design, with brand that hopefully indicates durability
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I want in a trail running shoe. They are lightweight whilst feeling surprisingly sturdy, with a thick, cushioned sole. Perfect for the rougher trails. I am reviewing the black versions, which are very non-descript to look at, but that's no issue for me. I am usually a size 10, but a 9.5 fitted perfectly. Time will tell whether they stand up to regular trail-running, but with the Salomon brand I'd hope that I can rely on them. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Salomon Hombre Trailster trail running footwear
customer_reviews.text: Salomon Hombre Trailster footwear arrived quickly and fit quite well. I am sometimes dubious ordering online but wasn't disappointed with these trainers. They are a good, all around shoe perfect for everyday wear. They are comfortable and my feet don't hurt after a long day wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Marx1977

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but too small.
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely pair of running shoes. Well made and look good feeling robust. What a disappointment when my husband tried them on (he's a regular 8.5) and they were way too narrow for him and too small in length too.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

product_meta.title: Salomon Trailster Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Trailster shoe will take your runs beyond the trailhead. Built to bring you confidence on the trails, this shoe delivers comfort, protection and grip that will make every trail run even more fun. Lightness: Enjoy a lightweight shoe (around 290 g), even on longer workouts. Traditional Lacing System: The traditional lacing system allows you to manually tie and adjust your shoes to achieve the perfect fit. Fit Management: The Sensifit system cradles the foot perfectly, offering a secure and snug fit. Sole: The resistant Contagrip sole offers greater traction on soft and hard surfaces.
feature_bullets: A Generous Fit Is Complimented By Salomon'S Energy Cell Midsole And Ortholite Sockliner.
The New Contagrip Sole Offers Superior Traction On Soft Or Hard Surfaces.
Lighter Than Other Shoes In Its Class, Access Still Offers Toe And Heel Protection, Along With Stable Support Underfoot.
